channel.title: Help with my client loginbox/button
channel.description:
Yeah I followed a tutorial I found searching the forums and I compiled and got the following.
[IMG]http://i233.photobucket.com/albums/ee303/magiklyfe/gfd.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help with my client loginbox/button
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

Well here it is,

[code]if (s.startsWith(“titlebox”)){
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./sprites/loginbox.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
}catch (Exception exception){
System.out.println(“could not load: “+s+” “+i+”.jpg”);
}
}
try if (s.equalsIgnoreCase(“titlebutton”))
{

{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Sprites/loginbutton.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
} [/code]

I was playing around with it and fucked it up a bit, lol. But hey thanks you actually understand this.

item.title: Help with my client loginbox/button
item.dc:creator: @iKolli iKolli`
item.description:
@iKolli wrote:

Well, on ‘Class30_Sub2_Sub1.java’ on line 101 you have

else if (s.startsWith("titlebox")){

Try taking the ‘else’ out. It’s telling you that there is no if before it. If you post lines 90-130 I’ll be glad to help.

Read full topic
